name: Oila's Inferno
description:
Shoot - Left Mouse Button

Move - Arrow/WASD

Jump - Space

One day in math class, little Oila (Oy-Lah not Yu-Lah) falls asleep during a lesson about division. The last thing she hears before drifting off to dream land is her teacher saying "...it is impossible to divide by zero!"

Influenced by her teacher's statement, dream Oila dared to do the impossible and successfully divided by zero! But alas... there were dire consequences for such hubris, for it opened a portal to HELL! Now Oila must battle her way through imaginary numbers to get back to the waking world, a world where numbers do not attack.

Coding - Mike

Coding - Nick

Sound - Eli

Art - Diana

Brainstorming - Andy

Math Consultant - Dalton

Mascot - Matt
